Packages 
Package Description
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms
Contains components which are fundamental for all similarity measures.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api
This package includes the interfaces for similarity measures.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical
Contains text similarity measures for lexical similarity.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.ngrams
Contains text similarity measures that operate on character or word n-gram text representations.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.string
Contains a variety of text similarity measures that operate solely on the string representations of texts, e.g. a measure based on the longest common subsequence.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.string.util.gst  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr
Contains text similarity measures that are based on lexical-semantic resources such as WordNet.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.aggregate
Contains aggregation strategies which allow to aggregate the scores of term similarity measures to the text level in order to get a single overall text similarity score.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.gloss
Contains text similarity measures that are based on comparisons of the glosses of two words that are part of a given lexical-semantic resources.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.path
Contains text similarity measures that are based on comparisons of the connecting paths of two words within a given lexical-semantic resources.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.ml
Contains text similarity measures that are based on machine learning.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.sound
Contains text similarity measures that are based on phonetic representations.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.sound.dict  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.sound.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.structure
Contains text similarity measures that are based on structural comparisons.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.style
Contains text similarity algorithms that are based on stylistic comparisons.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm
Contains text similarity measures that are based on vector comparisons, e.g.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store
Contains classes for working with vector spaces.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.convert
Contains classes for converting vector indexes.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.vectorindex
Contains classes for working with Vector Indexes.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia
Contains text similarity measures that are based on Wikipedia, e.g. the WLM measure which operates on the hyperlinks in Wikipedia.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.annotator
Contains the core DKPro components for adding text similarity computation to a DKPro pipeline.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.api.type  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.io
Contains input/output components for text similarity computation in a DKPro pipeline such as dedicated corpus readers.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.io.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource
Contains the external resources which wrap the text similarity measures for use in a DKPro pipeline.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lexical.ngrams  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lexical.string  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lsr  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lsr.aggregate  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lsr.gloss  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.ml  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.structure  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.style  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.test  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.vsm  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.vsm.esaindexer
Components which allow the creation of custom indexes to be used in conjunction with Explicit Semantic Analysis.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.entailment.type  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.example
Contains working examples of text similarity computation algorithms either in a stand-alone setting, or in conjunction with a DKPro pipeline, as well as machine learning examples.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.example.ml  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.example.ml.mm09  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.wordchoice
Contains word choice experiments.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.wordchoice.io  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.wordchoice.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.wordpairs
Contains word pair experiments.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.wordpairs.io  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.ml
Components which allow for using machine learning in conjunction with the similarity components.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.ml.filters  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.ml.io
Components for input/output in combination with machine learning algorithms.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.ml.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.temp  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.type
